iaik.pdf.parameters

Class PadesBasicParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • iaik.pdf.parameters.SignatureParameters
      • iaik.pdf.parameters.PdfSignatureParameters
        • iaik.pdf.parameters.PadesBasicParameters

  • public class PadesBasicParameters
extends PdfSignatureParameters
    Parameter class used to create PDF signatures according to profile PAdES basic.
    See Also:
    PdfSignatureInstance

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PadesBasicParameters(boolean detached)
      Constructor for parameters using subfilter adbe.pkcs7.detached or adbe.pkcs7.sha1 as specified in profile PAdES basic.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PadesBasicParameters

        public PadesBasicParameters(boolean detached)
        Constructor for parameters using subfilter adbe.pkcs7.detached or adbe.pkcs7.sha1 as specified in profile PAdES basic. Subfilter adbe.pkcs7.detached requires an explicit signed data object, whereas subfilter adbe.pkcs7.sha1 requires an implicit signature (using the sha1 hash of the signed data as content).
        Parameters:
        detached - if true uses subfilter adbe.pkcs7.detached, if false uses adbe.pkcs7.sha1
